description: Campaign group Extinction Rebellion shares a video showing French police spraying protesters.
title: Climate activists at French airport protest 'doused in pepper spray'
title_page: Climate activists at French airport protest 'doused in pepper spray' - BBC News
maintext: Along with a reduction of flights from Chamb¨¦ry airport, those participating in Saturday's protest were calling for an increase in fuel taxes and the eventual closure of the airport.
